text.autoconfig.mace-mod.title: MaceMod Configuration
Automatically tracks targets within your FOV. Uses human-like smoothing to avoid detection.
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.Smoothin: Controls tracking speed (0-100%). Higher = faster/snappier, Lower = smoother/more human-like. Recommended: 15-25%.
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.minDelay: Minimum wait time before swapping/attacking. Prevents instant bot-like reactions that trigger anti-cheat. Recommended: 100-150ms.
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.maxDelay: Maximum wait time for randomized delays. Creates realistic human reaction variation. Recommended: 250-350ms.
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.fallTrig: Distance (in blocks) you must fall before auto-swapping to Mace. The '5-Block Rule' maximizes fall damage. Default: 5.0 blocks.
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.Survival: Attack reach in Survival mode. Vanilla limit is 3.0 blocks. Higher values may get flagged on anti-cheat servers!
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.Creative: Attack reach in Creative mode. Vanilla Creative allows up to 5.0 blocks.
Hotbar slot (1-9) containing your axe. Set to -1 to disable axe attacks. Use 'R' key to auto-scan.
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.maceSlot: Hotbar slot (1-9) containing your mace. Set to -1 to disable mace attacks. Use 'R' key to auto-scan.
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.FOV.@Too: Field of view angle for target detection. Lower = must aim closer to target. Recommended: 25-35 degrees for legit gameplay.
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.Cooldown: Only attack when weapon charge is at this level (0.0-1.0). Set to 1.0 to only attack when fully charged for maximum damage.
